# UISplitViewController.DisplayModeButtonVisibility.never

**Case**

A constant that prevents the display mode button from appearing.

## Declaration

```swift
case never
```

## Constants

- **UISplitViewController.DisplayModeButtonVisibility.automatic**: A constant that automatically determines the visibility of the display mode button.
- **UISplitViewController.DisplayModeButtonVisibility.always**: A constant that allows the display mode button to always appear.
